sentence.Network_en: The government most assuredly does believe in organic farming.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府确实坚信有机耕作切实可行。

sentence.Network_en: He is, assuredly, not alone in believing they will win.
sentence.Network_cn: 毫无疑问，不止他一个人认为他们会赢。

sentence.Network_en: Provided we do all this, we shall assuredly succeed in our reform.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要我们做到这一切, 改革就一定能成功.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... reassure v 使确信，使放心 assuredly ad 无疑地 insure v 保险；保证.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... assured 确实的 assuredly 确实地 assuredness 确信.
英语专四词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... assessment n. 估计，估算；评估，评价 assuredly adv. 确实地，确信地 astound vt. 使惊骇，使大吃一惊.
... ... assure vt. 巩固，确保；想...保证，使确信 assuredly adv. 确实地，确信地；自信地，有把握地 astonish vt. 使惊讶.

list.abs: most assuredly , one of the most violent explosions ever witnessed by ancient humans .最明确的原因是古代人民所目击到的一个最猛烈的星星爆炸。
Provided we do all this , we shall assuredly succeed in our reform ., 如果大家都这样 , 改革就一定能成功.
man is really require a angel who been loved assuredly by himself , and woman is really require a gentleman who is love her well and truly .男人要找一个自己爱的女人；而女人则必须找一个爱自己的男人。
So , feed mill must assuredly improves formula feed quality , create a brand ;, 所以 , 饲料厂必须确实地提高配合饲料质量 , 创造品牌;

entry.tran: 确定地；一定地；毫无疑问地
entry.def: If something is assuredly true, it is definitely true.

example.ex: He is, assuredly, not alone in believing they will win...
example.tran: 毫无疑问，不止他一个人认为他们会赢。

example.ex: The government most assuredly does believe in organic farming.
example.tran: 政府确实坚信有机耕作切实可行。

sentences.sentence: "the grammar schools were assuredly not intended for the gentry alone"

auth_sentence.content: Science most assuredly does apply to specific individual instances.
auth_sentence.res_content: Science most assuredly does apply to specific individual instances.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Science most assuredly does apply to specific individual instances.

auth_sentence.content: Most assuredly, and this faith will never be shaken.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most assuredly, and this faith will never be shaken.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most assuredly, and this faith will never be shaken.

auth_sentence.content: I see its mark as assuredly as the Mail does.
auth_sentence.res_content: I see its mark as assuredly as the Mail does.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I see its mark as assuredly as the Mail does.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑
